classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

disableGutters.description: If true, the left and right padding is removed.

fixed.description: Set the max-width to match the min-width of the current breakpoint. This is useful if you'd prefer to design for a fixed set of sizes instead of trying to accommodate a fully fluid viewport. It's fluid by default.

maxWidth.description: Determine the max-width of the container. The container width grows with the size of the screen. Set to false to disable maxWidth.

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
